sentences.en: alive to the moods of others.
sentences.cn: 对别人情绪很敏感

sentences.en: And remember, we want him alive.
sentences.cn: 记住，我们要他活着。

sentences.en: Apparently he’s alive and well and living in Brazil.
sentences.cn: 看来他还健在，住在巴西。

sentences.en: bigotry is still alive and kicking.
sentences.cn: 偏见仍然活蹦乱跳到处可见。

sentences.en: Both communities have a tradition of keeping history alive.
sentences.cn: 两个团体都有延续历史的传统。

sentences.en: From here on he brings the character confidently alive.
sentences.cn: 从这里开始他真正将这个角色演活了。

sentences.en: He is incredibly lucky to be alive.
sentences.cn: 他能活下来真是命大。

sentences.en: He was alive to what he was doing.
sentences.cn: 他很清楚他在做什么。

sentences.en: He was kept alive on a life-support machine.
sentences.cn: 他靠生命维持装置活着。

sentences.en: I never expected to feel so alive in my life again.
sentences.cn: 我怎么也没想到自己会再一次这样活力焕发。

sentences.en: It was a bad accident – they’re lucky to be alive.
sentences.cn: 这是一宗严重事故——他们能活着实属幸运。

sentences.en: It was the kind of morning when you wake up and feel really alive .
sentences.cn: 这是一个醒来时觉得充满活力的早晨。

sentences.en: It was the kind of morning when you wake up and feel really alive.
sentences.cn: 这是一个醒来时觉得充满活力的早晨。

sentences.en: My grandparents are still alive .
sentences.cn: 我的祖父母和外祖父母都还健在。

sentences.en: Our relationship made me feel more alive.
sentences.cn: 我们的关系使我感到更有活力。

sentences.en: She made history come alive with tales from her own memories.
sentences.cn: 通过讲述自己记忆中的故事，她把逝去的岁月变得生动起来。

sentences.en: Suddenly music that seemed dull and repetitive comes alive.
sentences.cn: 突然间，似乎索然无味且反反复复的音乐生动了起来。

sentences.en: The big factories are trying to stay alive by cutting costs.
sentences.cn: 大型工厂正试图通过削减成本以维持生存。

sentences.en: The doctor's voice had come alive and his small eyes shone.
sentences.cn: 医生的嗓音恢复了活力，两只小眼睛也有了神采。

sentences.en: the sports car industry is alive and well.
sentences.cn: 跑车业仍然很兴旺。

sentences.en: The street was alive with the sounds of the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 这条街道上到处都是士兵的声音。

sentences.en: To remain together was like volunteering to be flayed alive.
sentences.cn: 再要呆在一起就好像自愿被活活剥皮一样。

sentences.en: We all wonder you're still alive.
sentences.cn: 我们都很惊讶你居然还活着。

sentences.en: We stayed alive by eating berries.
sentences.cn: 我们靠吃浆果活命。

sentences.en: You must be alive to op-portunity!
sentences.cn: 你必须注意机会！

words.tran_cn: 有活力的,有生命的,有形的

phrases.tran_cn: 仍然存在的，活跃的（常用来否定某事物已经消失或衰退的传闻或看法）
使继续有效，使继续存在(或进行)
活跃起来；看上去像真的
点火电极；保持生机；使……活着
严厉申斥；以压倒优势击败

trans.tran_cn: 活着的，有活力的，热闹的，继续存在的，觉察到的，充满（活的东西）
